attributes.action: Order the BBC to sack those BBC bosses involved in the Prof Brian Cox 'aliens might use swear words' controversy.
attributes.additional_details: It CANNOT be right that these people are right thinking; intelligent nor reasonable people.  It therefore follows that they should NOT be in positions where the decisionsn they make have an effect upon money taken off the population under threat of criminalisation.  THESE PEOPLE MUST GO BEFORE THEY CAUSE A JIMMY SAVILE STYLE DEBACLE SOME TIME IN THE FUTURE.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC.
